revised_title: Unitary Representations of Non-Compact Groups: Widetilde{SU}4 and Particle-Like States
tldr: The article explores the unitary representations of non-compact groups, specifically the subgroup of SU(4), and their potential relevance to particle physics. The author discusses the different interpretations of the group and its relationship with the Poincare group, as well as the conditions for unitary representations. The study of these representations could provide insights into the nature of particles and their interactions.
